cooking_method: Marinate mutton with yogurt and spices. Fry onions and garlic. Add mutton and cook until tender. Boil rice separately. Layer rice and mutton. Cook on low heat for 30 minutes.
Mix mashed potatoes and eggplant. Fry onions and green chilies. Add the potato and eggplant mixture. Cook for 10 minutes. Drizzle with mustard oil. Serve hot.
Boil milk, cream and condensed milk. Add cardamom powder. Let it cool. Pour the mixture into kulfi molds. Freeze for 6 hours. Garnish with pistachios. Serve cold.
